Classes in org.smartfrog.services.anubis.partition.comms.blocking that implement ConnectionFactory
 class MessageConnectionServer
          When a connection request is received the MessageConnectionServer accepts it, but at that point it doesn't know where it is coming from, and so can not assign it to a message connection.
